description:
Kevin is a 22 year old grad student working on his masters in fitness and nutrition.
Well, it's certainly clear that he's learning something while working on his degree because this guy is in amazing shape. He's a handsome, athletic, and fun-to-be-around type of guy, and is someone we had a blast with when we met him. He's the type who is always joking about something and had us laughing non-stop. He's currently casually dating, but hasn't found the 'right' girl yet. Ladies, get in line... this one's a keeper.
We're happy to welcome Kevin to the NDM crew and we hope you enjoy him as much as he enjoys himself here in his Next Door Male debut.
title: Kevin
